CBS has announced. Mitt Romney , who was a 2008 Republican presidential candidate, is to appear on the program Tuesday. He is promoting the publication of the paperback version of his book, No Apology: Believe in America. This will be Mitt Romney 's second visit to the CBS broadcast. He previously sat down for an interview with David Letterman on the "Late Show" last March 2, the network noted. Also
